66c44604cb4eb360fdd929f0.Header: New in The War Within Pre-Patch!

TopLeftFeature.Title: Radiant Echoes
TopLeftFeature.Description: Vanquish foes from Azeroth's past as memories resurface. Available July 30th!

RightFeature.Title: Warbands
RightFeature.Description: Your characters share access to a Warbands bank, Dragonflight reputations, and more!

BottomLeftFeature.Title: Nerub-ar Palace
BottomLeftFeature.Description: Assault the seat of Queen Ansurek's power within Azj-Kahet.

TopLeftFeature.Title: Season 1 Begins
TopLeftFeature.Description: Earn rewards in Mythic dungeons and the new Rated Battleground Blitz!

RightFeature.Title: Zekvir's Lair
RightFeature.Description: Progress in new Seasonal Delve content to unlock Zekvir's Lair.

BottomLeftFeature.Title: Hero Talents
BottomLeftFeature.Description: Expand your class fantasy and customize your talent build!

TopLeftFeature.Title: Delves
TopLeftFeature.Description: Dive deep into Delves, unravel mysteries, and seek treasure.

RightFeature.Title: The War Within
RightFeature.Description: Travel to Khaz Algar and heed the call of the Radiant Song!
